subject: Re: [junit] Re: Eclipse is closed automatically when tried to add Junit
msgSnippet: ... FYI, the filename in question is just .log , but the same advice applies.  It s also the case that Emacs won t auto-complete this filename, which has
messageBody:
Clark I Anderson wrote:
>> 1. I do not find the file $yourworkspace/.metadata/.log
>> I could see .metadata file but not .log file
>>
>
> A 'wild guess'? In Windows Explorer, there is the Option:
> [ ] Hide file extensions for known file types
> If that option was checked metadata.log might appear: metadata
>

FYI, the filename in question is just ".log", but the same advice
applies. It's also the case that Emacs won't auto-complete this
filename, which has confused me more than once.

David Saff
